channel.title: Comments on: An interview with Sridhar Katakam
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: How to Succeed at Freelancing – Learn what it really takes
item.dc:creator: How to Succeed at Freelancing – Learn what it really takes
item.description: […] He earned over $6000 in the first month of offering paid service. Read Sridhar Katakam’s full interview here. […]
item.content:encoded: […] He earned over $6000 in the first month of offering paid service. Read Sridhar Katakam’s full interview here. […]

item.title: By: Sridhar Katakam
item.dc:creator: Sridhar Katakam
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/srikat-interview/#comment-59">Piccia Neri</a>.
http://www.paidmembershipspro.com/2015/02/multiple-membership-levels-per-user-pmpro-workarounds/ is what I referred to. Workarounds are just that, workarounds - not a proper solution.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Piccia Neri.

http://www.paidmembershipspro.com/2015/02/multiple-membership-levels-per-user-pmpro-workarounds/ is what I referred to. Workarounds are just that, workarounds – not a proper solution.

item.title: By: Piccia Neri
item.dc:creator: Piccia Neri
item.description: Sridhar is a hero, thanks for the article Nick. Very interesting for me because I am setting up a membership site for a client right now, so it's great to have some insight on what Sridhar did for his own site. However, Sridhar says that PaidMembershipPro does not offer membership levels out of the box, but it looks to me as if it does: http://www.paidmembershipspro.com/features/unlimited-membership-levels/ Maybe he means something else?
item.content:encoded:
Sridhar is a hero, thanks for the article Nick.
Very interesting for me because I am setting up a membership site for a client right now, so it’s great to have some insight on what Sridhar did for his own site. However, Sridhar says that PaidMembershipPro does not offer membership levels out of the box, but it looks to me as if it does:
http://www.paidmembershipspro.com/features/unlimited-membership-levels/
Maybe he means something else?

item.title: By: Davinder Singh Kainth
item.dc:creator: Davinder Singh Kainth
item.description:
Great insights Sri.
Your future plans for the membership site looks promising. Best wishes.
Rightly said, lot of business opportunities with regard to Genesis learning and training.
item.content:encoded:
Great insights Sri.

Your future plans for the membership site looks promising. Best wishes.

Rightly said, lot of business opportunities with regard to Genesis learning and training.

item.title: By: Scot
item.dc:creator: Scot
item.description: Sridhar, is a coding hero. I have followed him for a long time. He has even helped me a few times for free. Once he switched to a paid membership site. I never blinded twice about the $10.00 a month. A+ in my book. -Scot
item.content:encoded:
Sridhar, is a coding hero. I have followed him for a long time. He has even helped me a few times for free. Once he switched to a paid membership site. I never blinded twice about the $10.00 a month. A+ in my book.
-Scot
